 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָשַׁר‎</span> **verb** ==bind, league together, conspire== (Late Hebrew ***id., bind, join***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶשֶׁר‎</span> ***knot***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְטַר‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind*** (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ט‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> after <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span>) [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xi.735</sup>, who compare also ('perhaps') Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***force*** to do a thing, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָשַׁר‎</span> [[Amos.7.10|Amos 7:10]]; [[1Kgs.16.16|1Kgs 16:16]] 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּקְשַׁרְתָּם‎</span> consecutive [[Deut.6.8|Deut 6:8]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקְשֹׁר‎</span> [[1Kgs.15.27|1Kgs 15:27]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקְשָׁרֿ‎</span> [[2Kgs.15.30|2Kgs 15:30]], etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָשְׁרֵם‎</span> [[Prov.3.3|Prov 3:3]] +; ***Participle active*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קשְׁרִים‎</span> [[2Sam.15.31|2Sam 15:31]] +; ***passive*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְשׁוּרָה‎</span> [[Gen.44.30|Gen 44:30]]; [[Prov.22.15|Prov 22:15]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְשֻׁרִים‎</span> [[Gen.30.42|Gen 30:42]] — 

**1.** ***bind:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** literal, with accusative of thing + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Gen.38.28|Gen 38:28]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Jer.51.63|Jer 51:63]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>, [[Josh.2.18|Josh 2:18]]; [[Josh.2.21|Josh 2:21]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]); ***bind, confine***, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵים‎</span> [[Job.39.10|Job 39:10]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּתֶלֶם‎</span>), accusative of crocodile [[Job.40.29|Job 40:29]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** figurative, with accusative + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> [[Deut.6.8|Deut 6:8]]; [[Deut.11.18|Deut 11:18]]; [[Prov.3.3|Prov 3:3]]; [[Prov.6.21|Prov 6:21]]; [[Prov.7.3|Prov 7:3]] (all of religious and moral precepts); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשׁוֺ קְשׁוּרָה בְנַפְשׁוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.44.30|Gen 44:30]] ***his life is bound up with his*** [namely the boy's] ***life*** ([[BDB#J|J]]; of strong affection); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְלֶבנָֿ֑עַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִוֶּלֶת ק‎</span> [[Prov.22.15|Prov 22:15]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** passive participle ***vigorous*** (properly well- ***knit***; opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲטֻפִים‎</span>) [[Gen.30.42|Gen 30:42]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). 

**2.** ***league together, conspire:*** with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָ‎</span> person ***against*** [[1Sam.22.8|1Sam 22:8]]; [[1Sam.22.13|1Sam 22:13]];  [[1Sam.1.27|1Sam 1:27]]; [[1Sam.16.9|1Sam 16:9]]; [[1Sam.2.9|1Sam 2:9]]; [[1Sam.15.10|1Sam 15:10]]; [[2Kgs.21.24|2Kgs 21:24]] = [[2Chr.33.24|2Chr 33:24]]; [[2Chr.33.25|2Chr 33:25]]; [[2Chr.24.21|2Chr 24:21]] with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶשֶׁר‎</span>, [[1Kgs.16.20|1Kgs 16:20]]; [[2Kgs.12.21|2Kgs 12:21]]; [[2Kgs.15.15|2Kgs 15:15]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[2Kgs.14.19|2Kgs 14:19]] = [[2Chr.25.27|2Chr 25:27]]; [[2Kgs.15.30|2Kgs 15:30]] absolute [[1Kgs.16.16|1Kgs 16:16]]; [[Neh.4.2|Neh 4:2]] (+ infinitive purpose); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִם‎</span>, together with, [[2Sam.15.31|2Sam 15:31]]. **Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְשְׁרָה‎</span> [[1Sam.18.1|1Sam 18:1]] ***the life of Jonathan was bound up with the life of David*** (**Qal 1 b**); ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּקָּשֵׁר כָּלהַֿחוֺמָה‎</span> [[Neh.3.38|Neh 3:38]] ***all the wall was joined together*** (the circuit complete). **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 

**1.** ***bind on*** (as ornament), 2 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּתְקַשְּׁרִים‎</span> [[Isa.49.18|Isa 49:18]] (figurative; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּלְבְּשִׁי‎</span>). 

**2.** ***bind fast***, 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְקַשּׁר‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַ‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַעֲדַנּוֺת כִּימָה‎</span> [[Job.38.31|Job 38:31]] ***canst thou bind fast the bands of the Pleiades***? **Pu\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַצּאִן‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמְּקֻשָּׁרוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.30.41|Gen 30:41]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), = **Qal 1 with Hithpa\`el** ***conspire: Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְקַשְּׁרוּ עַלֿ‎</span> [[2Chr.24.25|2Chr 24:25]] (\|\| [[2Kgs.12.21|2Kgs 12:21]] **Qal 2**); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְקַשּׁר אֶלֿ‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.14|2Kgs 9:14]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמִּתְקַשְּׁרִים עָלָיו‎</span> [[2Chr.24.26|2Chr 24:26]].
